Delays  Posted: 04/12/2014  2:01PM

Due to signal problems at E 180 St, [2] and [5] trains are running with delays in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[6] Brooklyn Bridge-bound trains skip Buhre Av, Westchester Sq and Zerega Av

Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 4 AM Mon, until Apr 14

For service to these stations, take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a
Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

For service from these stations, take the [6] to Pelham Bay Park and transfer to a
Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

Alternate travel note:
To Buhre Av and Westchester Sq, take the Bx24 bus instead.

Note: Middletown Rd and Castle Hill Av are closed for renovation.




Planned Work
[6] Pelham Bay Park-bound trains skip 51, 68, 77, 96, 103, 110 and 116 Sts

Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Apr 14

For service to these stations, take the [6] to 59 St or 125 St and transfer to a
downtown [4] local, [5]* or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] [5]* or [6] to 59 St or Grand Central-42 St
and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between uptown and downtown trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at 86 St.

your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Service Change  Posted: 04/12/2014  2:25PM

Due to track maintenance at Queens Plaza, the following service changes are in effect:

Northbound [E], [F] and [R] trains are running with delays.

Northbound [E] and [R] trains are running express from Queens Plaza to Jackson Heights- Roosevelt Av.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 04/12/2014  2:02PM

Due to track maintenance at W 4 St, [A], [C], [E] and [F] trains are running with delays in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[E] Jamaica Center-bound trains skip 75 Av and Van Wyck Blvd

Weekend, 12:15 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Apr 12 - 14

For service to 75 Av, take the [E] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [E] or [F].

For service to Van Wyck Blvd, take the [E] to Jamaica-Van Wyck and transfer to a
World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from these stations, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [E].




Planned Work
[E] Jamaica Center-bound trains skip Spring St and 23 St

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 11 - 14

For service to these stations, take the [E] to W 4 St or 34 St and transfer to a
World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from these stations, take the [E] to 14 St or Canal St and transfer
to a Jamaica Center-bound [E].




Planned Work
[C] Euclid Av-bound trains skip 50 St, 23 St and Spring St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 12 - 13

For service to 50 St, take the [C] to 42 St and transfer to an uptown [E].

For service to 23 St, transfer to the [E] at 42 St (across the platform).

For service from these stations, take the [E]. Transfer to the [C] at 42 St or 14 St.

For Spring St, take the [E] or [F]*. Transfer between trains at W 4 St or Canal St.

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[C] 168 St-bound trains skip Spring St, 23 St and 50 St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 12 - 13

For service to Spring and 23 Sts, take the [C] to W 4 St or 34 St and transfer
to a downtown [E].

For service to 50 St, transfer to the [E] at 42 St.

For service from these stations, take the [E] to 42 St, 14 St or Canal St
and transfer to a 168 St-bound [C].

Due to track maintenance at 36 St (Bklyn), southbound [D], [N] and [R] trains are running with delays.

Allow additional travel time.

Due to track maintenance at W 4 St, [A], [C], [E] and [F] trains are running with delays in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[M] Trains run approximately every 20 minutes

Weekends, 4 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, until Apr 27

• Please allow additional travel time.

Special Timetable | pdf




Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains skip 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park, Fort Hamilton Pkwy and Ditmas Av

Weekend, 7 AM to 7 PM, Sat and Sun, Apr 12 - 13

For service to 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park and Fort Hamilton Pkwy, take the [F] to 7 Av or Church Av
and transfer to a Queens-bound [F] or [G].

For service from these stations, take the [F] or [G] to 7 Av or Smith-9 Sts and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [F].

For service to Ditmas Av, take the [F] to 18 Av and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from this station, take the [F] to Church Av and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].




Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run via the [A] from W 4 St to Jay St-MetroTech

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 11 - 14

No Coney Island-bound [F] service at B'way-Lafayette St, 2 Av, Delancey St,
East Broadway and York St.

For service to B'way-Lafayette St, transfer to the [D] at W 4 St.

For service to 2 Av, Delancey St and East Broadway, take the [F] to Jay St-MetroTech
and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from these stations, take the [F] to W 4 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

For York St, use the nearby High St [A] [C] Station instead.




Planned Work
[F] Jamaica-bound trains skip 75 Av, Van Wyck Blvd and Sutphin Blvd

Weekend, 12:15 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Apr 12 - 14

For service to 75 Av, take the [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [E] or [F].

For service to Van Wyck and Sutphin Blvds, take the [F] to Parsons Blvd and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [F].

For service from 75 Av and Van Wyck Blvd, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av and
transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from Sutphin Blvd, take the [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].




Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run via the [E] from Roosevelt Av to 5 Av/53 St

Weekends, 11:15 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Apr 14

Trains resume regular service at 47-50 Sts.

No Coney Island-bound [F] service at 21 St-Queensbridge, Roosevelt Island,
Lexington Av/63 St and 57 St.

Travel Alternatives

For service to these stations, take the [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from 21 St-Queensbridge and Roosevelt Island, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

From Lexington Av/63 St, use the nearby 59 St [4] [5] [6] Station for downtown local service
to 51 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F] at the [E] [M] platform.

From 57 St, use the nearby 57 St-7 Av [N] [Q] [R] Station for downtown service to
34 St-Herald Sq where Coney Island-bound [F] service is available.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

text:
Planned Work
[J] Jamaica Center-bound trains run express from Marcy Av to Broadway Junction

Weekends, 3:45 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, until Apr 27

Trains stop at Myrtle Av.

For service to Hewes, Lorimer Sts and Flushing Av, take the [J] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Chambers St-bound [J].

For service from these stations, take the [J] to Marcy Av (with Unlimited Ride MetroCard only)
or Essex St and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J].

For service to Kosciuszko St, Gates Av, Halsey and Chauncey Sts, take the [J] to Broadway Junction
and transfer to a Chambers St-bound [J].

For service from these stations, take the [J] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J].

Alternate travel note:
From Hewes, Lorimer Sts and Flushing Av, take the B46 bus to Myrtle Av for [J] service.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
